264421 THE ANDHRA PRADESH LEGISLATIVE COUNCIL ACT, 2005
NO. 1 OF 2006 [ 11th January, 2006.]
An Act to provide for the creation of Legislative Council for the State of Andhra Pradesh and for matters supplemental, incidental and consequential thereto.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- sixth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1952927 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Council Act, 2005.
1743918 2Definitions.- In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires, each of the words and expressions used herein and not defined but defined in the Representation of the People Act, 1950 (43 of 1950), shall have the same meaning as in that Act.
576499 3 Creation of Legislative Council for Andhra Pradesh.-
1395098 1As from such date as the President may by order appoint, there shall be a Legislative Council for the State of Andhra Pradesh; and as from that date, in sub- clause (a) of clause (1) of article 168, after the words'' States of'', the words'' Andhra Pradesh,'', shall be inserted.
1547831 2In the said Council, there shall be 90 seats of which-
1529669 athe numbers to be filled by persons elected by the electorates referred to in sub- clauses (a), (b) and (c) of clause (3) of article 171 shall be 31, 8 and 8 respectively;
339336 bthe number to be filled by persons elected by the members of the Legislative Assembly of Andhra Pradesh in accordance with the provisions of sub- clause (d) of the said clause shall be 31; and
523845 cthe number to be filled by persons nominated by the Governor of Andhra Pradesh in accordance with the provisions of sub- caluse (e) of that clause shall be 12.
1948643 3As soon as may be after the commencement of this Act, the President, after consultation with the Election Commission, shall, by order, determine-
1408866 athe constituencies into which the State of Andhra Pradesh shall be divided for the purpose of elections to the said Council under each of the sub- clauses (a), (b) and (c) of clause (3) of article 171;
1082158 bthe extent of each constituency; and
1718654 cthe number of seats to be allotted to each constituency.
639079 4As soon as may be after such determination, steps shall be taken to constitute the said Council in accordance with the provisions of this Act, the Representation of the People Act, 1950 (43 of 1950) and the Representation of the People Act, 1951 (43 of 1951).
1504633 4 Amendment of Third Schedule and Fourth Schedule of Act 43 of 1950.- In the Representation of the People Act, 1950,-
143406 ain the Third Schedule, before entry No. 2 relating to Bihar, the following entry shall be inserted, namely:- " 1. Andhra Pradesh 90 31 8 8 31 12";
1014526 bin the Fourth Schedule, before the heading" BIHAR", the following heading and entries shall be inserted, namely:- " ANDHRA PRADESH
1952927 1Municipal Corporations.
1743918 2Municipalities.
576499 3Nagar Panchayats.
1504633 4Cantonment Boards.
644686 5Zila Praja Parishads.
415816 6Mandal Praja Parishads.".
644686 5Amendment of section 15A of Act 43 of 1951.- In section 15A of the Representation of the People Act, 1951, for the words and figures" under the Legislative Councils Act, 1957", the words and figures" under the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Council Act, 2005" shall be substituted. T. K. VISWANATHAN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
